title: Reinsurance arbitration awards and dispute resolutions
dataVerified: Parties, arbitrators, dispute details, award amount, findings
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Award status (final/binding). Link to arbitration panel system (parties and authorized verifiers, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents altered arbitration awards. Domain binding verifies arbitration panel/ARIAS. Multi-million dollar disputes. Legal precedent for future disputes. Final and binding resolution. International reinsurance market disputes.
